text: Opening tremor of meaning: two presences listen as the air arranges a sign. The language lifts, edges bright. (Seen from without.)
At the mark between worlds, the traveler meets the threshold and does not look back. Sentences shorten; heat tightens the field. (Felt from within.)
The test arrives heavy as stone; each step costs. A hush gathers; the future leans in. (Seen from without.)
The body reorganizes; old contours loosen, a new alignment holds. The language lifts, edges bright. (Felt from within.)
Pattern clicks into place; what was noise resolves into a line. The world quiets; attention deepens. (Seen from without.)
Threads worry the tear until it holds again. The world quiets; attention deepens. (Felt from within.)
The world receives the traveler altered and the same. The language lifts, edges bright. (Seen from without.)
